channel.title: CVE Feed for FLOWRING -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FLOWRING -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39037|2024-08-03T11:10:32.438Z -- flowring -- agentflow%20bpm
item.description: Agentflow BPM file download function has a path traversal vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2022-39036|2024-08-03T11:10:32.404Z -- flowring -- agentflow%20bpm
item.description: The file upload function of Agentflow BPM has insufficient filtering for special characters in URLs. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary file and execute arbitrary code to manipulate system or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-39038|2024-08-03T11:10:32.261Z -- flowring -- agentflow%20bpm
item.description: Agentflow BPM enterprise management system has improper authentication. A remote attacker with general user privilege can change the name of the user account to acquire arbitrary account privilege, and access, manipulate system or disrupt service.
